definition: an unknown and unpredictable phenomenon that causes an event to result one way rather than another
details:
noun
- an unknown and unpredictable phenomenon that causes an event to result one way rather than another
= synonyms: chance
- an unknown and unpredictable phenomenon that leads to a favorable outcome
= synonyms: luck
- a large amount of wealth or prosperity
- your overall circumstances or condition in life (including everything that happens to you)
= example: your overall circumstances or condition in life (including everything that happens to you)
= synonyms: fate
